name: Vermont Maple Bacon Dip
author: McCormick Spice
summary: This is everything you love about Vermont – cheese, apples and of course, maple syrup – all blended into one delicious dip. Creamy and Cheddar-cheesy, McCormick® Original Country Gravy Mix adds a crave-worthy flavor that can't be beat. Grab a plate of French toast sticks, mini waffles or crackers and dig in!
ingredients: 1 package McCormick® Original Country Gravy Mix
1 ½ cups shredded sharp Vermont Cheddar cheese, such as Cabot®, divided
directions: Mix cream cheese, mayonnaise, milk, bacon, Gravy Mix and 1 cup of the cheese in large bowl until well blended
Spread in 9-inch glass pie plate sprayed with no stick cooking spray
Top with apple and remaining 1/2 cup cheese
Bake 25 minutes or until heated through and cheese is melted
